curam.util.common.message
Interface MessageLocalizer

All Known Implementing Classes:
CatalogMessageLocalizer, CustomMessageLocalizer, FallbackCatalogMessageLocalizer
public interface MessageLocalizer

An interface for classes that can localize a message. Different localizers will use different sources for the message strings.

Method Summary
 LocalizedMessage localizeMessage(Message message, java.util.Locale locale)
          Localizes a message.
 

Method Detail

localizeMessage

LocalizedMessage localizeMessage(Message message,
                                 java.util.Locale locale)
                                 throws MessageException
Localizes a message.

Parameters:
message - The message to be localized.
locale - The locale to use.
Returns:
The localized message.
Throws:
MessageException - If the message cannot be localized.
